titleStmt.title: Almightie God I pray, his holy spirite to send the iust mannes hart stedfast to stay, and wicked liues to mend.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Christopher, ballad-writer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Without Aldersgate, in little Britaine: by Alex. Lacy.,

notesStmt.note: Poem on anagram: Tempus edax rerum time bryngethe al thynges to an ende quod Christopher Wilson.
Includes also poem beginning "Some hope you see," printed in column on right side of page.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
